titles.title: A bill to amend the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and Related Agencies Appropriation Act, 1986, to extend the life of the Commission on the Ukraine Famine.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendment to Senate bill.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and Related Agencies Appropriation Act, 1986 to extend the termination date of the Commission on the Ukraine Famine until June 22, 1990. (Presently, the Commission is scheduled to terminate on April 22, 1988.) Requires any vacancy in the Commission to be filled in the manner in which the original appointment was made.
